description:
Parts of this canyon, specifically the upper portion and the bottom closest to the road, are on private land. You can not exit this canyon without crossing private land, so it should be considered closed. The Ouray Canyon Club may be able to provide access. If you'd like to descend this canyon, contact them first via their web site.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

This canyon partially flows through private land, and should be considered closed. See the introduction for more information and who to contact to possibly get access.
